title: Angry Dad: The Movie
description: Web cartoon turned Oscar-winning animated short from the twisted mind of Bart Simpson.
altHero: a poorly drawn Homer Simpson is angry
alt1: Homer is angry, crumpling his drink cup in a fast food restaurant
alt2: Homer has grown huge, smashing the restaurant to dust
alt3: Homer is a giant, stomping away from the city
alt4: Homer punches a hole in the Hoover dam and water gushes out
